CustomField.description: Formula field to return a translated version of Units__c if user is using Salesforce in a different language. Depending on userâ€™s language locale, can return Units__c, Units_Language_1__c, Units_Language_2__c, or Units_Language_3__c. Displayed in ManageIndicators, SetTargets, and AddResults.
CustomField.formula: CASE($Label.ampi__USER_LANGUAGE_CODE, '1', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Units_Language_1__c, ampi__Units__c), '2', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Units_Language_2__c, ampi__Units__c), '3', BLANKVALUE(ampi__Units_Language_3__c, ampi__Units__c), ampi__Units__c )
CustomField.label: Units Translated
